@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC Why can't you spell good?
@BrewmeisterSTC @drewcaps1 Sean, he is owning us if you look at the alternative facts!
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC You're not good at this, Drew.

@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC How progressive of you!

@BrewmeisterSTC @drewcaps1 That's what my mom tells me
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC I only use the finest, AMERICAN MADE lard in my cooking!
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC We're like Obama and Biden. Except a little more cool.
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC I don't know. I'm sure they hurt Donald's feelings, but I don't know him that well.
@BrewmeisterSTC @drewcaps1 Trump wouldn't know anything about that.
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC Thank you! That means a lot
@BrewmeisterSTC @drewcaps1 And the tiny hands.
@BrewmeisterSTC @drewcaps1 Yeah. Trump knows he's fat. You don't have to rub it in.

@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC The medical term is "Rectal Perforation"
@BrewmeisterSTC @drewcaps1 Some people are cucks
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC We don't have to be mad. Our hands are normal adult sized.
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC Hey that's "Doctor Fatass" to you
@BrewmeisterSTC @drewcaps1 I always attract the gay ones. Never fails.
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC Please stop calling the president fat. Have some respect.
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC This is the gif the LAMESTREAM media DOESN'T want you to see!
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC @CSNCapitals Again, Drew, didn't march. I'm too fat, remember?
@BrewmeisterSTC @drewcaps1 @CSNCapitals Trump's not my president! I only answer to the black guy from the first 3 seasons of 24
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC @CSNCapitals We know how it works. You text A B C or D to 99099 and find out the winner next episode!
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC @CSNCapitals Donald, is that you? Did you get another twitter account?
@BrewmeisterSTC @drewcaps1 @CSNCapitals It makes perfect sense! Drew has never seen a woman, so he doesn't know what they actually look like
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC @CSNCapitals You mean nocturnal discharges?
@BrewmeisterSTC @drewcaps1 @CSNCapitals TRUMP THAT BITCH
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC @CSNCapitals Trump told me that when you're a star, they let you do it. You don't even have to ask!
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC @CSNCapitals I don't know. I didn't go. I'm afraid of women. They have cooties.
@BrewmeisterSTC @drewcaps1 @CSNCapitals Trump wouldn't have gone out like that. He'd have fought the Romans because he's tough!
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC @CSNCapitals You can eat your way through anything. Through Jesus, all things are possible.
@drewcaps1 @BrewmeisterSTC @CSNCapitals You think my fat ass was gonna march in the cold and rain? C'mon Drew! You know me better than that!
@BrewmeisterSTC @drewcaps1 @CSNCapitals Election? That thing where the person who got more votes didn't win? I thought that was fake news!
@drewcaps1 @CSNCapitals Once again, jokes on you because I'm laying around being fat all day
@drewcaps1 @CSNCapitals Trump proved that even a fat guy with an ill fitting suit can be president #inspired
@drewcaps1 @CSNCapitals Listen, just because they were fat doesn't mean they aren't women
@drewcaps1 @CSNCapitals I just take it one tiny Trump-hand sized step at a time
@drewcaps1 @CSNCapitals Jokes on you, I'm only 60 pounds overweight
@drewcaps1 @CSNCapitals Jesus frowns on people who use language like that.
